findings.recommendation: Add SameSite flag to Set-Cookie header

suggestions: ✓ Add Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin to limit referrer leakage
✓ Set SameSite=Lax or SameSite=Strict to mitigate CSRF attacks

findings.detail: Missing Strict-Transport-Security: Enforce HTTPS - prevents MITM attacks
Missing X-Content-Type-Options: Prevent MIME type sniffing
Missing Content-Security-Policy: Mitigate XSS and injection attacks
Missing Referrer-Policy: Control referrer information leakage
Missing X-XSS-Protection: Legacy XSS protection (deprecated but helpful for older browsers)
findings.recommendation: Set to '1; mode=block' for older browsers

suggestions: ⚠️ CRITICAL: Enable Strict-Transport-Security (HSTS) to force HTTPS. Use: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload
✓ Add X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff to prevent MIME sniffing
✓ Add X-Frame-Options to prevent clickjacking (use DENY or SAMEORIGIN)
✓ Implement Content-Security-Policy to mitigate XSS and injection attacks
✓ Add Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin to limit referrer leakage
✓ Add X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block (legacy but helpful for older browsers)
ℹ️ No cookies set; verify this is intentional
